video.title: Unplanned America
video.synopsis: Three adventure-seeking Australians throw out their guidebooks and hunt out America's secretive and rarely seen subcultures.

episodes.synopsis: The crew ventures to Seattle and goes on patrol with a controversial vigilante group, then heads to a Southern California sex doll factory.
episodes.title: When Fantasy Meets Reality

episodes.synopsis: The boys head to Southern Illinois and meet the FBI-outlawed Juggalo family, then check out New York City's gay, black underground ballroom scene.
episodes.title: Family Matters

episodes.synopsis: The crew visits the Los Angeles set of "Austin Powers XXX: A Porn Parody," then finds themselves in a massive nude bike ride in Portland.
episodes.title: Inhibition and Exhibition

episodes.synopsis: The boys find themselves on the streets of South Chicago learning about rappers and the ghetto. Then, Pawel and Gonzo get into a graffiti war.
episodes.title: The Boyz in the Hood

episodes.synopsis: In Detroit, the boys are inspired by the pride of the locals, and in the Salton Sea, they find a community of artists, drug addicts and hippies.
episodes.title: Waking Up from the American Dream

episodes.synopsis: It's a grab bag of unplanned fun, with spring break stun guns, lassoing lessons from kids, football tailgating parties, UFO chasers and more.
episodes.title: On the Road

episodes.synopsis: The team delves into the darker shades of human sexuality at a BDSM training chateau in upstate New York.
episodes.title: The Ties That Bind

episodes.synopsis: The team explores the medicinal and recreational sides of the legal marijuana revolution, goes on a legal weed tour and examines cannabis as a cure.
episodes.title: Rocky Mountain High

episodes.synopsis: The team gets a warped lesson in America's obesity epidemic, tackling 20,000-calorie burgers, then spends Christmas lunch at a homeless shelter.
episodes.title: Food for Thought

episodes.synopsis: The team gets tattoos at a legendary parlor, watches reformed gang members remove their ink and sees a cancer patient receive cosmetic tattooing.
episodes.title: Marked Men

episodes.synopsis: In Portland, Oregon, the unlikely strip club capital of the U.S., the team gets the lowdown on what it's like to work in this stigmatized industry.
episodes.title: Naked Truth

episodes.synopsis: The team gets swept up by the musical soul of New Orleans, joining a funeral march, busking punk-style, spitting rhymes and throwing a street parade.
episodes.title: Born on the Bayou

episodes.synopsis: The guys try to get back in shape by visiting the World Beer Pong Championships, a boxing gym in New York and a Renaissance faire in Louisiana.
episodes.title: Blood, Sweat and Beers

episodes.synopsis: The guys visit an anarchist skateboarding commune in Ohio and travel to the "world's biggest open-air mental asylum" in New Mexico.
episodes.title: Life Off The Grid

episodes.synopsis: The guys visit three women who make a living providing adult entertainment as "cam girls." Then, they go to a latex fitting in New York City.
episodes.title: Sex and Sellability

episodes.synopsis: The guys spend time with the Lumbee Indians in North Carolina, then travel to New Orleans to explore Voodoo culture.
episodes.title: Clash of Cultures

episodes.synopsis: Gonzo, Nick and Parv visit a cannabis shaman in the mountains of Colorado, then travel to New Jersey for Thanksgiving at the Church of Satan.
episodes.title: The Shaman on the Mount

episodes.synopsis: The guys examine American gun culture, spending time with a Virginia open carry organization, then traveling south to hang out with the Texas Militia.
episodes.title: Guns ‘n’ Ammo
